resources.string:
"Help:
1.Connect the headsets to AC1 or AC2 audio connector according which looper to be tested.
2.Tap each looper to start test.
3.In each looper talk to input and can hear from output.
4.Set test result manually"
"Help:\n1. Please Unplug the earphone2. Speak into the microphone,set the result pass when hear the sounds"
"Help:\n1. Please insert the left earphone\n2. Speak into the microphone,set the result pass when hear the sounds"
"Help:\n1. Please insert the right earphone\n2. Speak into the microphone,set the result pass when hear the sounds"
